ol.li: SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="LOINC_TBD_002" ED Observations Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:4)
contains zero or more [0..*] templateId1 with @xsi:type="II"
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:5)
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] title and SHOULD equal "ED Observations Section"

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry {subsets Section::entry}, where its type is ED Discharge Disposition Observation (CONF:6)
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Discharge Disposition Observation

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is ED Cause Of Injury Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Cause Of Injury Observation

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is ED Discharge Diagnosis
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Discharge Diagnosis

SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] entry, where its type is ED Encounter
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Encounter

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry, where its type is ED Systolic BP Observation
Contains exactly one [1..1] ED Systolic BP Observation
